headline: 3 Reasons to Sell BALL and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, Ball’s shares (currently trading at $53.12) have posted a disappointing 9.1% loss, well below the S&P 500’s 9.9% gain. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
